mapper.select: SELECT tt.id, tt.startTime, tt.endTime, tt.remark, tt.schedultMatter, tt.callonAddress, tt.createdId, tt.interviewFalg, tt.contactId, tt.contactName, tt.contactPost, tt.contactPhone, tt.contactCompany, tt.projectId, tt.projectName, tt.industryOwnName, tt.financeStatusName, tt.significanceId, tt.significanceName, tt.wakeupId, tt.wakeupTime, tt.fileKey, tt.fileLength, tt.bucketName, tt.fileName, tt.viewNotes, tt.talkRecordId, dct4.dict_value interviewResultId, dct4.dict_code interviewResultCode, dct4.`name` interviewResult, dct5.dict_value resultReasonId, dct5.dict_code resultReasonCode, dct5.`name` resultReason, tt.reason_other reasonOther, tt.meetingId, tt.meetingNotes FROM (select info.id, date_format(info.start_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') startTime, date_format(info.end_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') endTime, info.remark remark, info.name schedultMatter, info.callon_address callonAddress, info.created_id createdId, case UNIX_TIMESTAMP(current_timestamp())>UNIX_TIMESTAMP(info.start_time) when 1 then 1 else 0 end interviewFalg, con.id contactId, con.name contactName, con.post contactPost, con.phone1 contactPhone, con.company contactCompany, project.id projectId, project.project_name projectName, dct1.name industryOwnName, info.significance significanceId, dct3.name significanceName, info.wakeup_id wakeupId, sd.name wakeupTime, sf.file_key fileKey, sf.file_length fileLength, sf.bucket_name bucketName, sf.file_name fileName, inre.view_notes viewNotes, inre.id talkRecordId, inre.interview_result, inre.reason_other, inre.result_reason, case WHEN locate('Veto',inre.result_reason)>0 THEN 'meetingVetoReason' WHEN locate('Undetermined',inre.result_reason)>0 THEN 'meetingUndeterminedReason' WHEN locate('Following',inre.result_reason)>0 THEN 'meetingFollowingReason' else '' end resultReason, CASE WHEN r.content_choose IN('尚未获投','不明确') THEN r.content_choose else di.name end financeStatusName, mr.id meetingId, mr.meeting_notes meetingNotes from schedule_info info left join schedule_contacts con on info.callon_person=con.id left join sop_project project on info.project_type=1 and info.project_id=project.id left join dict dct1 on dct1.parent_code='industryOwn' and dct1.dict_code=project.industry_own left join dict dct3 on dct3.parent_code='significance' and dct3.dict_value=info.significance left join schedule_dict sd on sd.id = info.wakeup_id left join sop_interview_record inre on inre.schedule_id=info.id LEFT JOIN sop_meeting_record mr on mr.schedule_id=info.id left join sop_file sf on sf.id=inre.file_id LEFT JOIN information_result r on r.project_id=info.project_id and r.title_id=1108 LEFT JOIN information_dictionary di on r.content_choose=di.id where info.id=#{id} and info.is_del=0 inre.interview_valid =0 and mr.meet_valid = 0 and sf.file_valid=1 ORDER BY inre.created_time desc ) tt LEFT JOIN dict dct4 ON dct4.parent_code='meetingResult' and dct4.dict_code=tt.interview_result LEFT JOIN dict dct5 ON dct5.parent_code=tt.resultReason and dct5.dict_code=tt.result_reason;
select dict.parent_code parentCode, dict.name, dict.dict_value dictValue from dict dict where dict.parent_code ='significance';
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sop_interview_record WHERE interview_valid = 0 and schedule_id in (SELECT id FROM schedule_info WHERE callon_person=#{conId});
